title: A Lot of Mic Struggle
itunes:title: A Lot of Mic Struggle
description:
Tuesday 2/20- Today on the show we had Gun Play stop by where he spoke about Love and Hip Hop Miami, drugs, a near death experience with Rick Ross and more. We also addressed all the mic struggle that happened this weekend between Blac Chyna's leaked sex tape and Fergie singing at the All Star game. In fact, Charlamagne gave Fergie "Donkey of the Day" after her voice and brain took a knee while singing the national anthem, in other words it was not her best. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see who had the worst mic performance Fergie or Blac Chyna. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
